环境¶

硬件¶

单片机 ：STM32F107VCT6

  • F = general-purpose
  • 107 = connectivity, USB OTG FS & Ethernet
  • V = 100 pins
  • C = 256 Kbytes of Flash memory
  • T = LQFP
  • 6 = Industrial temperature range, –40 to 85 °C.
  • 64k RAM
  • 5 × USARTs,
  • 4 × 16-bit timers,
  • 2 × basic timers,
  • 3 × SPIs,
  • 2 × I2S,
  • 1 × I2C,
  • USB OTG FS,
  • 2 × CANs,
  • 1 × PWM timer,
  • 2 × ADCs,
  • 2 × DACs,
  • Ethernet
  • CPU frequency 72 MHz

CAN收发器 ：PCA82C251T

软件¶

集成开发环境 ：MDK-ARM-STM32

标准 ：OSEK-VDX COM

参考¶

[1]. STM32F107VC website

[2]. STM32F107VC Datasheet

[3]. STM32F107VC Reference manual
